2025-09-11.content: Assured Open Source Software (Assured OSS) now supports Go packages. For more information, see [Download Go packages using direct repository access for the free tier](https://cloud.google.com/assured-open-source-software/docs/download-go-packages).

summary.title: Go Packages Now Supported by Assured OSS
summary.summary: Assured Open Source Software (Assured OSS) now supports Go packages, allowing you to download them directly. This feature simplifies the process of managing and utilizing Go open source dependencies.
